column1: Only need the light when it's burning low
column2: 只有在朦胧黯淡时才念及灯火光亮
column3: Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
column4: 只有在冰天雪地时才怀念阳光温暖
column5: You only know you love her when you let her go
column6: 只有在已然放手后才始知那是真爱
column9: And now you staring at the bottom of your glass
column11: Hoping one day you'll make a dream last
column12: 希望有一天，你会做一个梦
column13: The dreams come slow and they go so fast
column14: 但是梦来的太慢，他们却以走远
column15: And you see you when you close your eyes
column16: 闭上双眼，整个脑海都是你
column17: Maybe one day you'll understand why
column18: 也许有一天，你会明白这一切
column20: 你是如何亲手毁掉了一段挚爱

column28: 只有在身处低谷时才遥想过去峥嵘
column29: Only hate the road when you're missin' home
column30: 只有在乡愁涌动时才痛恨旅途遥远

column33: Staring at the ceiling in the dark
column34: 繁星满天 你痴痴的望着天花板
column35: Same old empty feeling in your heart
column36: 又是一个无比寂寞空虚的无眠夜
column37: 'Cause love comes slow and it goes so fast
column38: 爱情来的温柔 去的残酷
column39: Well you see you when you fall asleep
column40: 如今你只得在梦里与她相见
column41: But never to touch no never to keep
column42: 可这梦脆弱的经不起触碰 经不起长久
